docs.title: Quota Manager
docs.text:
Smart quota allocation for AI-powered applications.

Quota Manager tracks API usage, predicts hourly surplus, and schedules background tasks — ensuring human requests always have priority.

docs.title: Core Principle
docs.text: Human requests ALWAYS have priority. Never block a human request.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Usage Tracking — Record calls per endpoint
  • Quota Prediction — Forecast hourly surplus
  • 50% Reserve — Always reserved for humans
  • Background Scheduling — Use leftover quota safely

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Quota-Manager.git
cd Quota-Manager
uv venv && uv pip install -e ".[dev]"

docs.title: Basic Usage
docs.text:
from quota_manager import QuotaManager

qm = QuotaManager()

# Check available quota
available = qm.available_quota()

# Record usage
qm.record_usage("gemini_api", tokens=1000)

# Get prediction
surplus = qm.predict_surplus(hours=1)

docs.title: Priority Queue
docs.text:
┌─────────────────┐
│ Human Requests  │ ← Always first
├─────────────────┤
│ Background Jobs │ ← Only when surplus
└─────────────────┘

docs.title: 50% Reserve Rule
docs.text: At all times, 50% of remaining quota is reserved for human requests.

docs.title: Background Task Example
docs.text:
from quota_manager import BackgroundScheduler

scheduler = BackgroundScheduler()

@scheduler.task(cost=10)
async def run_batch_analysis():
    # Only runs when quota available
    pass
